name: Eric Tsang
summary: Eric Tsang. Actor: Infernal Affairs. Eric Tsang was born on 14 April 1953 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and producer, known for Infernal Affairs (2002), Hold You Tight (1998) and The Eye (2002). He was previously married to Mei-Hua Wang.
